column4: hi guys, i was looking at htop and discovererd that root was running svn update by itself, nothing i started etc. could i be hacked? what are my options? how can i verify?
so nothing that said it called svn update
/etc/crin.d was the first thing i checked
how can i list all the svn repositories on my computer
do those things if you want my help ;)
Page 14 - what does it say to do? http://usa.visa.com/download/merchants/cisp_what_to_do_if_compromised.pdf
I know your machine probably has nothing to do with PCI compliance, but it's good to follow regardless ;-)
